mapper.sql: ID, CSST_ID, FEEDBACK_NO, CLASS_ID, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_STAFF_NO, TEACHER_TYPE, STAGE_ID, SUBJECT_ID, BATCH_NUM, BRANCH_ID, SUBSECTORS_ID, COURSE_TYPE, BU_ID,QUIT_NUM, EXAM_WAY, EXAM_TYPE, SCORE_RATIO, SCORE, LESSON_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SURVEY_NUM, REAL_NUM
mapper.insert:
insert into teacher_score_ratio(CSST_ID, FEEDBACK_NO, CLASS_ID, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_STAFF_NO, TEACHER_TYPE, STAGE_ID, SUBJECT_ID, BATCH_NUM, BRANCH_ID, SUBSECTORS_ID, COURSE_TYPE, BU_ID,QUIT_NUM, EXAM_WAY, EXAM_TYPE, SCORE_RATIO, SCORE, LESSON_DATE, SURVEY_NUM, REAL_NUM) values
(#{item.csstId}, #{item.feedbackNo}, #{item.classId}, #{item.classNo}, #{item.teacherStaffNo}, #{item.teacherType}, #{item.stageId}, #{item.subjectId}, #{item.batchNum}, #{item.branchId}, #{item.subsectorsId}, #{item.courseType}, #{item.buId}, #{item.quitNum}, #{item.examWay}, #{item.examType}, #{item.scoreRatio}, #{item.score}, #{item.lessonDate}, #{item.surveyNum}, #{item.realNum})

insert into teacher_score_ratio(CSST_ID, FEEDBACK_NO, CLASS_ID, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_STAFF_NO, TEACHER_TYPE, STAGE_ID, SUBJECT_ID, BATCH_NUM, BRANCH_ID, SUBSECTORS_ID, COURSE_TYPE, BU_ID, QUIT_NUM, EXAM_WAY, EXAM_TYPE, SCORE_RATIO, SCORE, LESSON_DATE) select csst.ID, fb.FEEDBACK_NO, ci.ID, ci.CLASS_NO, csst.TEACHER_STAFF_NO, csst.TEACHER_TYPE, csst.STAGE_ID, csst.SUBJECT_ID, csst.BATCH_NUM, ci.BRANCH_ID, ci.SUBSECTORS_ID, ci.COURSE_TYPE, ci.BU_ID, from class_stage_subject_teacher csst, class_info ci, feed_back_stage fbs, feed_back fb where ci.ID = csst.CLASS_ID and csst.CLASS_ID = fbs.CLASS_ID and csst.STAGE_ID = fbs.STAGE_ID and (csst.SUBJECT_ID = fbs.SUBJECT_ID or fbs.SUBJECT_ID = -1) and fb.ID = fbs.FEED_BACK_ID and csst.`STATUS` = 7 and csst.SCORE > 0 and csst.SURVEY_NUM > 0 and csst.REAL_NUM > 0
